-- This file is generated from Test.ump --

MODULE Sm
  
  VAR 
    state : { s1 , s2 , s2a , s2b , s2c }; 
    event : { e1 , e2 , e3 };  
    
  ASSIGN
    init(state) := s1;   
     
  TRANS
    (state = s1) -> (
        (event = e1 & next(state) = s2)  |
        (event = e2 & next(state) = s2b)  ) |
    (state = s2) -> (
        event = e1 & next(state) = s1)
